---
name: ilx-first-exploration
description: Use ILX semantic maps as the first source of code understanding before reading actual source files. ILX provides compressed domain/view context (300-500:1 compression) enabling faster understanding. Fall back to source code if no ILX exists. ONLY activates for Ruby/Rails projects (detects Gemfile).
triggers:
  - code-exploration
  - understanding-codebase
  - feature-implementation
  - debugging
  - planning
